quotes.content: I want to make a ding in the universe.
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follwer
Design is not only what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't loose faith.
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.content: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.content: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.content: Whether you believe you can do a thing or not, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford
